title: Amateurish and disappointing
review: Scary? No. Well-acted? Hardly. Inventive? Certainly not. What a waste of two hours, sitting through this rubbish. I'm convinced that the only reason most people stick with it is that they believe there must be some REALLY scary scene at the end to make up for the total lack of frights in the rest of the film.But no, the ending is just as flat as the rest of this cheap nonsense.Avoid like the plague!
